item.title: Bejnar: redirect unsourced deprecated term, see Garner and Siegal both cited at Afghan
item.description:
redirect unsourced deprecated term, see Garner and Siegal both cited at Afghan

← Previous revision Revision as of 22:25, 20 December 2015
Line 1: Line 1:
#REDIRECT [[Afghan]]
'''Afghanistani''' refers to someone possessing the nationality of the country [[Afghanistan]]. It generally refers to the nation and people of the country [[Afghanistan]].

Coined recently, the word Afghanistani is a wide-range title that reflects all citizens of [[Afghanistan]] with different races and backgrounds, rather than only referring to [[Pashtun people|Pashtun]] people.

== See also ==
* [[Afghani (disambiguation)]]
* [[Demography of Afghanistan]]
* [[Special:Allpages/Afghan|List of all pages beginning with "Afghan"]]

{{disambig}}
item.dc:creator: Bejnar

'''Afghanistani''' refers to someone possessing the nationality of the country [[Afghanistan]]. It generally refers to the nation and people of the country [[Afghanistan]].
'''Afghanistani''' refers to someone possessing the nationality of the country [[Afghanistan]]. It generally refers to the nation and people of the country [[Afghanistan]].


Coined recently, the word Afghanistani is a wide-range title that reflects all citizens of [[Afghanistan]] with different races and backgrounds, even though the native Afghans are the Persian speaking Tajiks.
Coined recently, the word Afghanistani is a wide-range title that reflects all citizens of [[Afghanistan]] with different races and backgrounds, rather than only referring to [[Pashtun people|Pashtun]] people.

item.title: Slightsmile: That might be, discuss it on the talk page
item.description:
That might be, discuss it on the talk page

← Previous revision Revision as of 00:44, 13 March 2014
Line 1: Line 1:
'''Afghanistani''' refers to someone possessing the nationality of the country [[Afghanistan]]. It generally refers to the nation and people of the country [[Afghanistan]].
This term was coined recently by the supporters of Iranian culture in Afghanistan and is not recognized by the great majority of people in Afghanistan. Many believe that terms like this are used by Iran to drive a wedge between the different nations living in Afghanistan who collectively refer to themselves as Afghans.

Coined recently, the word Afghanistani is a wide-range title that reflects all citizens of [[Afghanistan]] with different races and backgrounds, rather than only referring to [[Pashtun people|Pashtun]] people.


== See also ==
